title: Real-Time Heart Rate Estimation from Video Using Face Detection and Signal Processing
content: In this work, we present a real-time heart rate estimation method from a video using face detection, color-based signal extraction, and signal processing tech- niques. The proposed approach computes the heart rate by analyzing the color fluctuations in the facial region of interest (ROI). This report outlines the math- ematical formulation and results of the implementation.
